lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : 李敏
[00:01.000] 作曲 : 日向大介 ( Hinata Daisuke)
[00:02.000] 编曲 : Yusuke Hatano
[00:11.957]我放低了酒杯 杯里是空气 我不想再喝酒 原因我在等你
[00:23.644]盼可将暖水 倒入杯里 期望你能会意 我潜藏动机
[00:35.006]恋一世的爱 刻骨铭心 为你 愿意等
[00:46.471]温水似的吻 终于发生 暖在我心
[00:57.787]Fill Me With Everlasting Love
[01:02.090]Let Me Trust In You
[01:05.019]Never Let Me Down
[01:08.009]And I'll Always Trust In You
[01:09.664]信这世间有真爱 能用我的心 去装载
[01:21.757]已放低我的心 一切递给你 太多困扰 原因我在等你
[01:33.376]以指尖去接触 杯内蒸气 投入爱情极美 我遗忘自己
[01:44.587]恋一世的爱 刻骨铭心 为你 愿意等
[01:56.206]温水似的吻 终于发生 暖在我心
[02:07.796]Fill Me With Your Love
[02:11.854]Let Me Trust In You
[02:14.721]Never Let Me Down
[02:17.584]Let Me Believe In You
[02:20.442]Fill Me With Your Love
[02:23.372]Let Me Trust In You
[02:26.320]Never Let Me Down
[02:29.250]Let Me Believe In You
[02:32.210]Fill Me With Your Touch
[02:35.055]Let Me Trust In You
[02:37.910]Never Let You Down
[02:40.841]So You Can Trust Me Too
[02:43.682]用我的爱念
[02:46.674]换你的信念
[02:49.562]未变的志愿
[02:52.484]恋一生也未厌
[02:52.996] 监制 : 莫文蔚/Edward Chan
[02:53.508] OP: HYPER GROUP PUBLISHING / WARNER CHAPPELL MUSIC HONG KONG LIMITED
[02:54.020] SP: EMI Music Publishing HK
[02:54.532] 
[02:55.044] 
[02:55.556] Keyboards by Edward Chan / Nick Wong / Yikin Lo 
[02:56.068] Guitar by Ariel Lai 
[02:56.580] Bass by Terry Chan 
[02:57.092] Drums by 李一丁
[02:57.604] Backing vocal arranged by Cousin Fung and performed by Cousin Fung / Claudia Koh / Jay Kan / Wendyz Zhang 
[02:58.116] All Programming by Yusuke Hatano 
[02:58.628] 
[02:59.140] Recorded by King Kong / Kelvin Au / Tsamchan and Miso Tech Audio Team, Fong Ka Ming / Wong Ka Chun / Li Ming Yip / Yeung Tsz Ching / Tang Chi Sang / Tse Ho Chung

[03:00.164] Protools Editing by Edward Chan / Kelvin Au / Anson Chan / Bertha Ngai / Y.Siu
